text: @FredTJoseph $monie1918 #RENTRELIEF #COVID19 in need of assistance desperately. Single mom of 5 now as I just had a baby 4 days ago and lost my job. Don’t know how I’m going to pay for anything. I HOPE YOU PICK ME
